oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. J. T. Bass to his parents
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. J. T. Bass, Co. C, 4th (McLemore's) Tenn. Cav., CSA, wrote to let his parents know that he was well and would like a letter from home. He heard that "Yanks got Eli Massey's whiskey." Bass expected a fight every day, and reported that [Gen. Earl] Van Dorn was there with 8,000 men.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
